description: City: Albany, NYIn 2012, Slidin’ Dirty officially brought the gourmet food truck craze to the Capital Region in New York. Owned and operated by Tim Taney and his wife Brooke, Slidin’ Dirty specializes in gourmet sliders and tapas style street food. The stylish Slidin’ Dirty food truck can be seen slidin’ around the streets of Troy, Albany, Saratoga and surrounding areas.Slidin Dirty and its owners also specialize in full service catering. Our catering services range from take out style drop offs to rolling up to an event in the Slidin’ Dirty food truck to full service banquets. So have Slidin’ Dirty be part of your next catering event, and be sure to find the Slidin’ Dirty truck coming to a street near you. Always remember that any occasion is the right occasion to be Slidin’ Dirty!
name: Slidin' Dirty
